snippet: The Documentation Center for the History of National Socialism leads visitors through the role that Munich and its society played in the rise of the Nazi movement.
abstract: Stark modernist building housing Documentation Center for the History of National Socialism has been built on site of Nazi party headquarters in Munich; museum features permanent exhibition that documents rise of Nazi party.
lead_paragraph: The Documentation Center for the History of National Socialism leads visitors through the role that Munich and its society played in the rise of the Nazi movement.

headline.main: Munich Museum Is Another Step in Acknowledging the City’s Nazi Past
headline.print_headline: Tracing Nazism’s Rise Where the Perpetrators Plotted Their Crimes

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Documentation Center for the History of National Socialism (Munich, Germany)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
